sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact-us', templateUrl: './contact-us.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-us.component.css'] }) export class ContactUsComponent implements OnInit { contactForm!: FormGroup; isSubmitted = false; isLoading = false; // Contact information contactInfo = { phone: '+91 98765 43210', email: 'info@vgfurniture.com', address: '123 Furniture Street, Design District, Mumbai - 400001', hours: 'Mon-Sat: 10:00 AM - 8:00 PM | Sun: 11:00 AM - 6:00 PM' }; // Services list services = [ { icon: 'fa-couch', title: 'Custom Furniture', desc: 'Tailored to your space and style' }, { icon: 'fa-truck', title: 'Free Delivery', desc: 'Within 50km radius' }, { icon: 'fa-screwdriver-wrench', title: 'Installation', desc: 'Professional assembly service' }, { icon: 'fa-shield-alt', title: '5-Year Warranty', desc: 'On all premium products' }, { icon: 'fa-undo', title: '30-Day Return', desc: 'Hassle-free returns' }, { icon: 'fa-paint-roller', title: 'Interior Consultation', desc: 'Free design consultation' } ]; // FAQ Section faqs = [ { question: 'What are your delivery charges?', answer: 'We offer free delivery within 50km. Beyond that, charges are calculated based on distance.', open: false }, { question: 'Do you provide installation services?', answer: 'Yes, professional installation is available for all our furniture at an additional charge.', open: false }, { question: 'What is your return policy?', answer: 'You can return any item within 30 days of delivery in its original condition.', open: false }, { question: 'Can I customize furniture dimensions?', answer: 'Yes, we offer custom sizing for most furniture items. Contact us for a quote.', open: false } ]; constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.initializeForm(); } initializeForm(): void { this.contactForm = this.fb.group({ name: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(3)]], email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]], phone: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.pattern(/^[0-9]{10}$/)]], subject: ['', [Validators.required]], message: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(20)]], contactMethod: ['email', [Validators.required]] }); } // Form submission onSubmit(): void { if (this.contactForm.valid) { this.isLoading = true; this.isSubmitted = false; // Simulate API call setTimeout(() => { console.log('Form submitted:', this.contactForm.value); this.isLoading = false; this.isSubmitted = true; this.contactForm.reset({ contactMethod: 'email' }); // Reset success message after 5 seconds setTimeout(() => { this.isSubmitted = false; }, 5000); }, 1500); } else { // Mark all fields as touched to show validation errors Object.keys(this.contactForm.controls).forEach(key => { this.contactForm.get(key)?.markAsTouched(); }); } } // Toggle FAQ toggleFAQ(index: number): void { this.faqs[index].open = !this.faqs[index].open; } // Quick contact buttons quickContact(method: string): void { if (method === 'call') { window.location.href = `tel:${this.contactInfo.phone}`; } else if (method === 'email') { window.location.href = `mailto:${this.contactInfo.email}`; } else if (method === 'whatsapp') { window.open(`https://wa.me/919876543210?text=Hello%20VG%20Furniture,%20I%20have%20a%20query`, '_blank'); } } // Getter for easy form access get f() { return this.contactForm.controls; } }
